MetaData.ApsimToSim:
[foreach Soil.SoilWater]
[Model SoilWater] [soil.SoilWater.DiffusConst] [soil.SoilWater.DiffusSlope] [soil.SoilWater.CN2Bare] [soil.SoilWater.CNRed] [soil.SoilWater.CNCov] [soil.SoilWater.Salb] [soil.SoilWater.SummerCona] [soil.SoilWater.WinterCona] [soil.SoilWater.SummerU] [soil.SoilWater.WinterU] [soil.SoilWater.SummerDate] [soil.SoilWater.WinterDate]
[soil.Water.Thickness] [soil.Water.SAT] [soil.Water.DUL] [soil.Water.LL15] [soil.Water.AirDry] [soil.SoilWater.SWCON] [soil.Water.BD] [soil.Water.SW]
[if [soil.SoilWater.MWCON]][soil.SoilWater.MWCON][endif] [if [soil.Water.KS]][soil.Water.KS][endif] [if [soil.SoilWater.Slope]][soil.SoilWater.Slope][endif] [if [soil.SoilWater.DischargeWidth]][soil.SoilWater.DischargeWidth][endif] [if [soil.SoilWater.CatchmentArea]][soil.SoilWater.CatchmentArea][endif] [if [soil.SoilWater.KLAT]][soil.SoilWater.KLAT][endif] [if [soil.SoilWater.MaxPond]][soil.SoilWater.MaxPond][endif]
[endfor] [foreach Soil.Swim]
[Model Swim3] [Swim.Cn2Bare] [Swim.CnRed] [Swim.CnCov] [Swim.Salb] [soil.Water.Thickness] [soil.Water.AirDry] [soil.Water.SAT] [soil.Water.DUL] [soil.Water.LL15] [soil.Water.BD] [soil.Water.SW] [soil.Water.KS] [soil.Swim.Kdul] [soil.Swim.PsiDUL] [soil.Swim.VC] apsim calc [soil.Swim.dtmin] [soil.Swim.dtmax] [soil.Swim.MaxWaterIncrement] [soil.Swim.SpaceWeightingFactor] [soil.Swim.SoluteSpaceWeightingFactor] [soil.Swim.diagnostics] [if [soil.Swim.SwimSubsurfaceDrain.DrainDepth]] [soil.Swim.SwimSubsurfaceDrain.DrainDepth] [soil.Swim.SwimSubsurfaceDrain.DrainSpacing] [soil.Swim.SwimSubsurfaceDrain.DrainRadius] [soil.Swim.SwimSubsurfaceDrain.Klat] [soil.Swim.SwimSubsurfaceDrain.ImpermDepth] [endif] [if [soil.Swim.SwimWaterTable.WaterTableDepth]] [soil.Swim.SwimWaterTable.WaterTableDepth] [endif]
[soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.a] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.dthc] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.dthp] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.dis] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.disp] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.WaterTableNO3] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.WaterTableNH4] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.WaterTableUrea] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.WaterTableCl] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.WaterTableTracer] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.WaterTableMineralisationInhibitor] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.WaterTableUreaseInhibitor] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.WaterTableNitrificationInhibitor] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.WaterTableDenitrificationInhibitor] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.NO3Exco] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.NO3FIP] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.NH4Exco] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.NH4FIP] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.UreaExco] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.UreaFIP] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.ClExco] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.ClFIP] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.TracerExco] [soil.Swim.SwimSoluteParameters.TracerFIP] [soil.MineralisationInhibitorExco] [soil.MineralisationInhibitorFIP] [soil.UreaseInhibitorExco] [soil.UreaseInhibitorFIP] [soil.NitrificationInhibitorExco] [soil.NitrificationInhibitorFIP] [soil.DenitrificationInhibitorExco] [soil.DenitrificationInhibitorFIP]
[endfor]
[Model SoilNitrogen] [if "[soil.SoilType]"][soil.SoilType][endif] [soil.SoilOrganicMatter.RootCN] [soil.SoilOrganicMatter.RootWt] [soil.SoilOrganicMatter.SoilCN] [soil.SoilOrganicMatter.EnrACoeff] [soil.SoilOrganicMatter.EnrBCoeff] off 0.75
[soil.SoilOrganicMatter.OC] [soil.Analysis.PH] [soil.SoilOrganicMatter.FBIOM] [soil.SoilOrganicMatter.FINERT] [soil.Nitrogen.NO3] [soil.Nitrogen.NH4] [if [soil.Analysis.Rocks]][soil.Analysis.Rocks][endif]
[foreach Soil.Phosphorus]
[Model SoilP] [soil.Phosphorus.RootCP] [soil.Phosphorus.RateDissolRock] [soil.Phosphorus.RateLossAvail] [soil.Phosphorus.SorptionCoeff] [soil.Phosphorus.LabileP] [soil.Phosphorus.BandedP] [soil.Phosphorus.RockP] [soil.Phosphorus.Sorption]
[endfor] [if [soil.Analysis.CL]]
25000 0 cl 0 [soil.Analysis.CL]
[endif] [foreach soil.SoilTemperature]
[Model SoilTemperature] [soil.Analysis.ParticleSizeClay] [soil.SoilTemperature.BoundaryLayerConductance] [if [soil.SoilTemperature.InitialSoilTemperature]][soil.SoilTemperature.InitialSoilTemperature][endif]
[endfor] [foreach soil.SoilTemperature2]
[Model SoilTemperature2] [soil.Analysis.ParticleSizeClay] [soil.SoilTemperature2.MaxTTimeDefault] [soil.SoilTemperature2.BoundaryLayerConductanceSource] [soil.SoilTemperature2.BoundaryLayerConductance] [soil.SoilTemperature2.BoundaryLayerConductanceIterations] [soil.SoilTemperature2.NetRadiationSource] [soil.SoilTemperature2.DefaultWindSpeed] [soil.SoilTemperature2.DefaultAltitude] [soil.SoilTemperature2.DefaultInstrumentHeight] [soil.SoilTemperature2.BareSoilHeight]
[endfor]

Model.name: SoilWater

canopy_eos_coef.description: coef. in exp effect of canopy on

sw_top_crit.description: critical sw ratio in top layer

solute_flow_eff.description: efficiency of moving solute with flow (0-1)

solute_flux_eff.description: efficiency of moving solute with flux (0-1)

gravity_gradient.description: soil water gradient due to gravitational

Model.mobile_solutes: no3 urea cl br org_n org_c_pool1 org_c_pool2 org_c_pool3

canopy_fact_default.description: canopy factor to use if height is missing

standard.fom_type: default manure mucuna lablab shemp stable

oc2om_factor.description: factor to convert organic carbon to

min_depth.description: depth of soil from which N can be

pHf_nit_pH.description: pH for specifying factor for nitrification

pHf_nit_values.description: value of pH factor for nitrification

dnit_rate_coeff.description: denitrification rate coefficient (kg soil/mg C per day)

dnit_wf_power.description: power term for calculation of water factor for denitrification

dnit_k1.description: K1 parameter from Thorburn et al(2010) for N2O model

dnit_wfps.description: WFPS for calculating n2o fraction of denitrification

dnit_n2o_factor.description: WFPS factor for n2o fraction of denitrification

nit_n2o_frac.description: Fraction of nitrified nitrogen lost as n2o

cnrf_coeff.description: coeff. to determine the magnitude of C:N effects on decomposition of FOM

cnrf_optcn.description: C:N above which decomposition rate of FOM declines

ef_biom.description: fraction of biomass C mineralized retained in system (0-1)

ef_fom.description: fraction of FOM C mineralized retained in system (0-1)

ef_hum.description: fraction of humic C mineralized retained in system (0-1)

ef_res.description: fraction of residue C mineralized retained in system (0-1)

fr_biom_biom.description: fraction of retained biomass C returned to biomass (0-1)

fr_fom_biom.description: fraction of retained FOM C transferred to biomass (0-1)

fr_res_biom.description: fraction of retained residue C transferred to biomass (0-1)

oc2om_factor.description: factor to convert organic carbon to organic matter

opt_temp.description: Soil temperature above which there is no further effect on mineralisation and nitrification (oC)

rd_biom.description: potential rate of soil biomass mineralization (per day)

rd_carb.description: maximum rate constant for decomposition of FPool1 (0-1)

rd_cell.description: maximum rate constant for decomposition of FPool2 (0-1)

rd_lign.description: maximum rate constant for decomposition of FPool3 (0-1)

rd_hum.description: potential rate of humus mineralization (per day)

min_depth.description: depth of soil from which N can be immobilised by decomposing surface residues (mm)

wfmin_index.description: index specifying water content for water factor for mineralization

wfmin_values.description: value of water factor function at given index values(mineralization)

wfnit_index.description: index specifying water content for water factor for nitrification

wfnit_values.description: value of water factor function at given index values(nitrification)

nh4_at_half_pot.description: NH4 concentration at half potential nitrification (Michaelis-Menton kinetics)

pHf_nit_pH.description: pH for specifying factor for nitrification

pHf_nit_values.description: value of pH factor for nitrification

dnit_rate_coeff.description: denitrification rate coefficient (kg soil/mg C per day)

dnit_wf_power.description: power term for calculation of water factor for denitrification where wf = ((SW-DUL)/(SAT-DUL))^P

cnrf_coeff.description: coeff. to determine the magnitude of C:N effects on decomposition of FOM

cnrf_optcn.description: C:N above which decomposition rate of FOM declines

ef_biom.description: fraction of biomass C mineralized retained in system (0-1)

ef_fom.description: fraction of FOM C mineralized retained in system (0-1)

ef_hum.description: fraction of humic C mineralized retained in system (0-1)

ef_res.description: fraction of residue C mineralized retained in system (0-1)

fr_biom_biom.description: fraction of retained biomass C returned to biomass (0-1)

fr_fom_biom.description: fraction of retained FOM C transferred to biomass (0-1)

fr_res_biom.description: fraction of retained residue C transferred to biomass (0-1)

rd_biom.description: potential rate of soil biomass mineralization (per day)

rd_carb.description: maximum rate constant for decomposition of FPool1 (0-1)

rd_lign.description: maximum rate constant for decomposition of FPool3 (0-1)

min_depth.description: depth of soil from which N can be immobilised by decomposing surface residues (mm)

wfmin_values.description: value of water factor function at given index values(mineralization)

wfnit_index.description: index specifying water content for water factor for nitrification

wfnit_values.description: value of water factor function at given index values(nitrification)

nh4_at_half_pot.description: NH4 concentration at half potential nitrification (Michaelis-Menton kinetics)

pHf_nit_values.description: value of pH factor for nitrification

dnit_rate_coeff.description: denitrification rate coefficient (kg soil/mg C per day)

dnit_wf_power.description: power term for calculation of water factor for denitrification where wf = ((SW-DUL)/(SAT-DUL))^P

cnrf_coeff.description: coeff. to determine the magnitude of C:N effects on decomposition of FOM

cnrf_optcn.description: C:N above which decomposition rate of FOM declines

ef_biom.description: fraction of biomass C mineralized retained in system (0-1)

ef_fom.description: fraction of FOM C mineralized retained in system (0-1)

ef_hum.description: fraction of humic C mineralized retained in system (0-1)

ef_res.description: fraction of residue C mineralized retained in system (0-1)

fr_biom_biom.description: fraction of retained biomass C returned to biomass (0-1)

fr_fom_biom.description: fraction of retained FOM C transferred to biomass (0-1)

fr_res_biom.description: fraction of retained residue C transferred to biomass (0-1)

soiln3.fom_type: default manure mucuna lablab shemp stable

oc2om_factor.description: factor to convert organic carbon to organic matter

opt_temp.description: Soil temperature above which there is no further effect on mineralisation and nitrification (oC)

rd_biom.description: potential rate of soil biomass mineralization (per day)

rd_carb.description: maximum rate constant for decomposition of FPool1 (0-1)

rd_cell.description: maximum rate constant for decomposition of FPool2 (0-1)

rd_lign.description: maximum rate constant for decomposition of FPool3 (0-1)

rd_hum.description: potential rate of humus mineralization (per day)

min_depth.description: depth of soil from which N can be immobilised by decomposing surface residues (mm)

wfmin_index.description: index specifying water content for water factor for mineralization

wfmin_values.description: value of water factor function at given index values(mineralization)

wfnit_index.description: index specifying water content for water factor for nitrification

wfnit_values.description: value of water factor function at given index values(nitrification)

nh4_at_half_pot.description: NH4 concentration at half potential nitrification (Michaelis-Menton kinetics)

pHf_nit_values.description: value of pH factor for nitrification

dnit_rate_coeff.description: denitrification rate coefficient (kg soil/mg C per day)

Model.name: SoilP

rate_decr_placement.description: 0.5 () ! (, 1) Fractional loss of placement effect per yr

act_energy_loss_avail_P.description: Effect of soil temperature on P availability

availP_ratio.description: Ratio of available P : unavailable P at steady state

eff_band.description: 3.0 () ! Relative effectiveness of banded_p compared with broadcast_p

Model.crop_name: maize wheat navybean cowpea pigeonpea soybean peanut mungbean weed sorghum butterflypea centro lablab millet millet1 millet2 millet3 millet4 millet5

BoundaryLayerConductanceIterations.description: Number of iterations to calc boundary layer conductance (0-10)

DefaultAltitude.description: default altitude (m) 275m (700 ft) is approx 980 hPa

DefaultInstrumentHeight.description: default instrument height for wind and temperature (m)
